messages.subject: Re: Private posts
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, I apologize for sending this to the entire list, but I need to say Thank You to those who have posted to me privately. Your kindness is
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone,

I apologize for sending this to the entire list, but I need to say "Thank
You" to those who have posted to me privately. Your kindness is appreciated and I
do promise to post back to each of you. Being that I still have some 175
posts to get through, I hope to finish up soon and answer you individually. Sorry
for taking so long, I had no idea I'd come home to so many.

Have a great day,
Rhonda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
